title: Casa Grande Eternia is one of its kind signature #villas in #Kalapatti, #Coimbatore where you will experience...

attachments.displayName:
Casa Grande Eternia is one of its kind signature #villas in #Kalapatti, #Coimbatore where you will experience the essentials of Peace, Comfort, Opulence, Space and Style. This unique creation is truly signature in nature. Intelligently planned, crafted with precision. Stylishly Designed, Casa Grande Eternia is created especially for those who wish to live a regal life drenched in ecstasies of supreme  luxury.

Salient Features:
Ground + 1 designed structure
1700-2400 sqft land area, 2000-3000 sqft built area
79 Villas
5.32 acre expanse
3&4 bedrooms with 1&2 living rooms options
2 exclusive car parks
Exclusive garden area
Open terrace space
Contemporary new age architecture
32 Apartments with Stilt+4 Design Structure,674-683 sqft,1 BHK,24 x 7 Power backup

http://casagrande.in/ProjectOverview.aspx?PID=39
